document_data.name: ''Chalice of Labelas''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Chalice of Labelas''''' was an enchanted work of art that originated from [[Evermeet]]. It was considered one of three [[Great Treasures of Evermeet]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Chalice'' remained constantly full of clean water. Anyone drinking from the ''Chalice'' was instantly healed of all injuries. The ''Chalice'' could even bring a dead person back to life if its waters were poured into their mouth. The [[resurrection]] power of the ''Chalice'' could only be used once per month.
document_data.Notable Owners: As one of the three Great Treasures of Evermeet, the ''Chalice'' was kept by [[Amlaruil Moonflower]].
